reviewText: Excellent series with in-depth first person interviews. Highly Recommended!!!!!

commences with the battle of nyezane then onto isandlwana,rorkes drift,ntombe,hlobane and finishes with khambula.excellent special comments by noted zulu historian ian knight,other comments by ian castle,john laband.the use of personnal diaries as narrations,is a big plus.nothing beats listening to the words of those who were present at these engagements,british and zulu alike.sepia video footage used for re-enactments,black and white photographs and colour footage used as a backdrop to the detailed narration.i think it is a very good piece of work.
